name: ai-voice-agent-optometry
description: AI Voice Agent for Optometry Practice - HIPAA compliant voice interaction system

scripts.dev:all: concurrently --prefix "[{name}]" --names "voice,schedule,patient,audit,practice,admin" "npm run dev --workspace=packages/voice-ai-service" "npm run dev --workspace=packages/scheduling-service" "npm run dev --workspace=packages/patient-verification-service" "npm run dev --workspace=packages/audit-service" "npm run dev --workspace=packages/practice-info-service" "npm run dev --workspace=packages/admin-dashboard"
scripts.docker:dev:rebuild: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build --force-recreate
scripts.setup:dev: cp .env.development .env && npm run docker:dev:clean && npm run docker:dev:detached
scripts.setup:local: cp .env.development .env && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces --if-present && rimraf node_modules dist

author: AI Voice Agent Development Team
